text: waman azlamu mimmani if'tara 平ala l-lahi kadhiban aw qala uhiya ilayya walam yuha ilayhi shayon waman qala sa-unzilu mith'la ma anzala l-lahu walaw tara idhi l-zalimuna fi ghamarati l-mawti wal-malaikatu basitu aydihim akhriju anfusakumu l-yawma tuj'zawna 平adhaba l-huni bima kuntum taquluna 平ala l-lahi ghayra l-haqi wakuntum 平an ayatihi tastakbiruna
